name: Lica
passiveDesc: When Lica casts Normal Skill, his Rifted Skill DMG is increased by 20%.
rTalentDesc: Lica's Normal and Charged Attacks generate 1 Flux.
normalAttackDesc: Lica deals 40% Physical ATK as Physical DMG to the opponent.
chargedAttackDesc: Lica deals 60% Physical ATK as Physical DMG to the opponent.
normalSkillDesc: Lica fires five Flame-Fusioned Arrows towards each opponent, each dealing 44 (+26% Physical ATK) as Flame-Fusioned DMG.
riftedSkillDesc: Lica fires a bulk of arrows, raining down on a small AoE area for 2 Cycles, each Cycle deals two instances of DMG, dealing 13 (+8% Phyiscal ATK) as Flame-Fusioned DMG and apply a Threat Mark on the opponent, max 4 stacks. Each stack increases Threats DMG by 8%.
fragment2Desc: When there are more than 2 Flame-Type characters in the team, Lica's Crit Rate is increased by 10%.
fragment4Desc: Lica's Rifted Skill "Threats"'s duration is increased by 1 Cycle. If the opponent has 4 Threat Marks, the duration is further increased by an additional Cycle. This effect has a 6 Cycle Cooldown.
fragment5Name: F5 - Truth Lies Beneath The Surface
fragment6Desc: Crit Rate is increased by 10%, Crit DMG is increased by 20%. The maximum Threats Marks on an opponent is increased by 4. Additionally, when there are no instances of Flame-Type DMG affecting the opponent except Lica, Lica's Rifted Skill "Threats"'s DMG is increased by 400% Lica's Phsysical ATK.
